paragraphs.name: 30cc
paragraphs.text: Here’s proof.

3eaaba7fae34.title: It’s plain truth to “write like no one is ever going to read what you have to say….”

paragraphs.text: It’s plain truth to “write like no one is ever going to read what you have to say….” But in reality we write for people to read; even just for the fun of it.
That said, you sure did offer pungent prescriptions for the craft. I’ll use them in my succeeding posts.
paragraphs.name: 9b5f

virtuals.subtitle: That said, you sure did offer pungent prescriptions for the craft. I’ll use them in my succeeding posts.

content.subtitle: That said, you sure did offer pungent prescriptions for the craft. I’ll use them in my succeeding posts.

paragraphs.text: “You bloody legend!”
That’s one of the highest forms of praise an Aussie can hand out to anyone! 😀

virtuals.subtitle: That’s one of the highest forms of praise an Aussie can hand out to anyone! 😀

content.subtitle: That’s one of the highest forms of praise an Aussie can hand out to anyone! 😀

155dc49cb00d.title: Thank you so much for the wonderful piece of advice and truly, I agree that the title and content…

paragraphs.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful piece of advice and truly, I agree that the title and content coupled with a good picture matters a lot. I’m hooked reading your piece until the very end because it intrigued me and want to know what to do if nobody bothered to read my writing. I’ll continue to write anyway until I found my bearing and tell the world what I write makes someone smile😊

81242ac78c22.title: Shaunta, I have enjoyed your posts and find them filled with great advice.

paragraphs.text: Shaunta, I have enjoyed your posts and find them filled with great advice. Thanks for sharing your resources and for being vulnerable.

d632506b9db.title: A genuine piece of writing! Just what I wanted. Thanks, Shaunta. :)

paragraphs.text: A genuine piece of writing! Just what I wanted. Thanks, Shaunta. :)
paragraphs.name: adf6

fabda69c2ec0.title: I have written this before and I will write this now and later, no doubt.

paragraphs.text: I have written this before and I will write this now and later, no doubt.
paragraphs.name: a449

paragraphs.text: I write to write. I do not write to publish or to sell or to be read. I write for me — mostly.
paragraphs.name: 5a47

paragraphs.text: I say mostly because I have come to realize I do want people to read my words, people other than me. I have also come to realize…

paragraphs.text: A motivative piece! I’m going to WRITE though I’m a 75 years 4 months and 11 days old exactly. I mention my age like all new arrivals do as they are vested with the right to express their ages in this way. I’m profoundly hearing- impaired as I won’t be able to hear the latest US air strikes on Syria. I believe in whenever I happen to write I will…

virtuals.subtitle: Her name is MAY MAY as everybody calls her affectionately MAY MAY.

content.subtitle: Her name is MAY MAY as everybody calls her affectionately MAY MAY.

e8e9543fabfd.title: I teach writing (writing, not promoting writing) privately and at writing conferences throughout…

paragraphs.text: I teach writing (writing, not promoting writing) privately and at writing conferences throughout the Southwest. Something unsettling happened at the last three writing conferences I spoke/taught at. The students and I were deep in Q&A about writing — inspiration, craft, being blocked, keeping on when one wants to give up. Then a student said…

8d94697f6e33.title: I write as if no one will ever read my stories.

paragraphs.text: I write as if no one will ever read my stories. I write them because I enjoy crafting the story, researching places and things.
paragraphs.name: d8d7

paragraphs.text: So far I have written 8 stories, that range from 55K words to almost 95K words long. It is funny that writing “career” only came about after I was put on antidepressants about 6 months ago. Up until…
paragraphs.name: 4aff

a7a4d8d77eb2.title: I really enjoyed reading this, but disagree that “no one cared” you spent a day playing at a water…

paragraphs.text: I really enjoyed reading this, but disagree that “no one cared” you spent a day playing at a water park. Your daughter cared. Deeply, I’d guess. Baring yourself to the world can be terrifying and embarrassing and unfulfilling when you think it’s only going to help one person. But sometimes one is enough.
paragraphs.name: b69f

9d8a7240949a.title: Hi Shaunta, you are so generous with your tips and somehow your writing causes me to act; I am…

paragraphs.text: Hi Shaunta, you are so generous with your tips and somehow your writing causes me to act; I am already trying to write 10 mins a day and I just used the headliner analyser. It is indeed liberating what you write so thanks fo another tip. You will see that I had orginally exiting stage right , scored a 12 the new title scored a 71!! best g.
paragraphs.name: 415c

9da65169fdb8.title: Get it, May May! I love how excited you are to write!

d11514452326.title: Wow. This hit me hard especially ‘ Write like no one is every going to read what you have to say.

paragraphs.text: Wow. This hit me hard especially ‘ Write like no one is every going to read what you have to say. And then be brave enough to get read anyway.’ thank you for writing this.

paragraphs.text: Thanks for this. Solid advice and the title checker is a great tool!
paragraphs.name: e369

paragraphs.text: BTW — I put on a two piece last year for the first time since 2002. I had a major surgery then and there’s a long, ugly scar across my midsection. No one noticed (or if they did, they sure didn’t seem to care).
paragraphs.name: 69ba

virtuals.subtitle: BTW — I put on a two piece last year for the first time since 2002. I had a major surgery then and there’s a long, ugly scar across my…

content.subtitle: BTW — I put on a two piece last year for the first time since 2002. I had a major surgery then and there’s a long, ugly scar across my…

paragraphs.text: Thank you for your story. I also lost a significant amount of weight (200 #). While that number astounds some people, it was’t difficult at all to gain that couple pounds a year (medications exacerbated and exponentially escalated the increase; nearly dying from a misdiagnosed reaction to antibiotics with muscle wasting spurred the loss). It was hell…
paragraphs.name: ca73

virtuals.subtitle: But I wrote you to say this. I made the error of writing deeply personal items in an attempt to purge demons. What a shock to see that…

content.subtitle: But I wrote you to say this. I made the error of writing deeply personal items in an attempt to purge demons. What a shock to see that…

51214dd20620.title: The hard reality is that there is no correlation between quantity of successful writing and quality…

paragraphs.text: The hard reality is that there is no correlation between quantity of successful writing and quality and important of the writing. Basically people want to be entertained not informed. Fantasy trumps reality any day. Emotion trumps insight.
paragraphs.name: 823d

paragraphs.text: Interesting. So you believe either you’re a lucky unicorn or a shit out of luck donkey? I mean, it’s ok to criticize my work. But you aren’t really giving much in the way of alternative theory.
paragraphs.name: 2b4b

paragraphs.text: So. Just checked your profile. You have nine followers and two of your last five posts are basically your comment here…negativity with no solution. If you added “here’s what you can do instead” to your posts, you would see a difference. No luck required.
paragraphs.name: f65c

279817cf6f2e.title: You’re amazing. Thank you so much for being so generous. I really really appreciate you.

paragraphs.text: You’re amazing. Thank you so much for being so generous. I really really appreciate you.

b72696807d.title: I’m less impressed than others that commented.

paragraphs.text: I’m less impressed than others that commented. For someone who calls themself a “professional” writer, and apparently is extremely focused on the structure, spelling, and grammar of a post, you seem not to be able to follow your own advice. After intense study, two books, a journalism position in print media, and a variety of other published material…
